channel.title: KDnuggets
channel.description: Data Science, Machine Learning, AI & Analytics

item.title: How to Create a Sampling Plan for Your Data Project
item.dc:creator: Cassie Kozyrkov
item.description: When simple random sampling is not that simple.

item.title: The Ultimate Guide To Different Word Embedding Techniques In NLP
item.dc:creator: Neeraj Agarwal
item.description: A machine can only understand numbers. As a result, converting text to numbers, called embedding text, is an actively researched topic. In this article, we review different word embedding techniques for converting text into vectors.

item.title: Attend the Data Science Symposium 2022, November 8 in Cincinnati
item.dc:creator: KDnuggets
item.description: The Center for Business Analytics at the University of Cincinnati will present its annual Data Science Symposium 2022 on November 8. This all day in-person event will have three featured speakers and two tech talk tracks with four concurrent presentations in each track. The event, held at the Lindner College of Business, is open to all.

item.title: The AI Education Gap and How to Close It
item.dc:creator: Rehgan Avon
item.description: AI education is broken, how do we solve it? Individuals end up learning a specific tool or tactic in a vacuum. They are missing the real-world applicability and collaboration that is critical to building impactful AI solutions in line with the organization’s strategy.

item.title: What is Statistical Skew?
item.dc:creator: Nisha Arya
item.description: Read this overview of what is skewness, and how to calculate it.

item.title: Simple and Fast Data Streaming for Machine Learning Projects
item.dc:creator: Abid Ali Awan
item.description: Learn about the cutting-edge DagsHub's Direct Data Access for simple and faster data loading and model training.

item.title: Getting Deep Learning working in the wild: A Data-Centric Course
item.dc:creator: KDnuggets
item.description: Data-centric learning resources are somewhat scattered today, and that’s why we developed a new Data Centric Deep Learning course on the co:rise education platform. It is an introduction to a set of approaches and best practices, for people who are trying to do deep learning in the wild.

item.title: 9 Skills You Need to Become a Data Engineer
item.dc:creator: Dorian Martin
item.description: A data engineer is a fast-growing profession with amazing challenges and rewards. Which skills do you need to become a data engineer? In this post, we’ll take a look at both hard and soft skills.

item.title: 30 Resources for Mastering Data Visualization
item.dc:creator: Nate Rosidi
item.description: Want to master data visualization? This list of 30 resources and tools will help you get started on your path toward mastering data visualization.

item.title: 7 Tips To Produce Readable Data Science Code
item.dc:creator: Sara A. Metwalli
item.description: In this article, we will go over a few steps that you can take to produce readable, high-quality code.

item.title: 365 Data Science courses free until November 21
item.dc:creator: KDnuggets
item.description: The unlimited access initiative provides a risk-free way to break into data science.

item.title: Random Forest vs Decision Tree: Key Differences
item.dc:creator: Saikumar Talari
item.description: Check out this reasoned comparison of 2 critical machine learning algorithms to help you better make an informed decision.

item.description: In this blog, we will explore how to get started with spaCy right from the installation to explore the various functionalities it provides.

item.title: Graphs: The natural way to understand data
item.dc:creator: KDnuggets
item.description: Graph Algorithms for Data Science is a hands-on guide to working with graph-based data in applications like machine learning, fraud detection, and business data analysis. Filled with fascinating and fun projects, demonstrating the ins-and-outs of graphs.

item.title: Machine Learning on the Edge
item.dc:creator: Najia Gul
item.description: Edge ML involves putting ML models on consumer devices where they can independently run inferences without an internet connection, in real-time, and at no cost.

item.dc:creator: Nisha Arya
item.description: Learn how data-centric AI can improve your model's overall performance.

item.description: Learn about various Diffusion-based applications to get inspiration for a final-year project, research, and product.

item.title: The ABCs of NLP, From A to Z
item.dc:creator: Matthew Mayo
item.description: There is no shortage of tools today that can help you through the steps of natural language processing, but if you want to get a handle on the basics this is a good place to start. Read about the ABCs of NLP, all the way from A to Z.

item.title: Top 10 MLOps Tools to Optimize & Manage Machine Learning Lifecycle
item.dc:creator: Saikiran Bellamkonda
item.description: As more businesses experiment with data, they realize that developing a machine learning (ML) model is only one of many steps in the ML lifecycle.

item.title: Easy Guide To Data Preprocessing In Python
item.dc:creator: Ahmad Anis
item.description: Preprocessing data for machine learning models is a core general skill for any Data Scientist or Machine Learning Engineer. Follow this guide using Pandas and Scikit-learn to improve your techniques and make sure your data leads to the best possible outcome.

item.description: Learn various algorithms to improve the robustness and performance of machine learning applications. Furthermore, it will help you build a more generalized and stable model.

item.dc:creator: Piyush Behre
item.description: As Speech Recognition has become more accurate than ever, scenarios like dictation and meeting transcription are gaining popularity. Metrics need to evolve with the times and guide the research focus.

item.description: This article will provide an overview of what TinyML is, its use cases, and why it is becoming more popular.

item.dc:creator: Matthew Mayo
item.description: This post is a summary of 2 distinct frameworks for approaching machine learning tasks, followed by a distilled third. Do they differ considerably (or at all) from each other, or from other such processes available?

item.dc:creator: Vidhi Chugh

item.title: 5 Free Courses to Master Calculus
item.dc:creator: Vidhi Chugh
item.description: Calculus is one of the foundational pillars of understanding the mathematics behind machine learning algorithms. The post shares five free courses to help you master calculus and learn its real-world applications.

item.title: Working With Sparse Features In Machine Learning Models
item.dc:creator: Arushi Prakash
item.description: Sparse features can cause problems like overfitting and suboptimal results in learning models, and understanding why this happens is crucial when developing models. Multiple methods, including dimensionality reduction, are available to overcome issues due to sparse features.

item.title: Implementing Adaboost in Scikit-learn
item.dc:creator: Nisha Arya
item.description: It is called Adaptive Boosting due to the fact that the weights are re-assigned to each instance, with higher weights being assigned to instances that are not correctly classified - therefore it ‘adapts’.

item.title: 7 Free Platforms for Building a Strong Data Science Portfolio
item.dc:creator: Abid Ali Awan
item.description: Outshine others and increase your odds of getting hired by maintaining a data science portfolio with projects, resumes, blogs, and reports.

item.title: Mathematics for Machine Learning: The Free eBook
item.dc:creator: Matthew Mayo
item.description: Check out this free ebook covering the fundamentals of mathematics for machine learning, as well as its companion website of exercises and Jupyter notebooks.

item.title: Explaining Explainable AI for Conversations
item.dc:creator: Surbhi Rathore
item.description: Something is missing in artificial intelligence – trust.

item.title: Sparse Matrix Representation in Python
item.dc:creator: Matthew Mayo
item.description: Leveraging sparse matrix representations for your data when appropriate can spare you memory storage. Have a look at the reasons why, see how to create sparse matrices in with Python, and compare the memory requirements for standard and sparse representations of the same data.

item.title: Classification Metrics Walkthrough: Logistic Regression with Accuracy, Precision, Recall, and ROC
item.dc:creator: Nisha Arya
item.description: In this article, I will be going through 4 common classification metrics: Accuracy, Precision, Recall, and ROC in relation to Logistic Regression.

item.title: 5 Free Courses to Master Linear Algebra
item.dc:creator: Vidhi Chugh
item.description: Linear Algebra is an important subfield of mathematics and forms a core foundation of machine learning algorithms. The post shares five free courses to master the concepts of linear algebra.
